channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Famed roboticist says humanoid robot bubble is doomed to burst
item.description: Brooks, who co-founded iRobot and spent decades at MIT, is particularly skeptical of companies like Tesla and Figure trying to teach robots dexterity ...

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds3 FE Review: Better AirPods for Android
item.description: These are as close to AirPods as it gets for Samsung phone owners.

item.title: Factor Protein Plus Meals Review (2025): Filling, Not Fattening
item.description: After most of a week air-frying Factor’s delivery high-protein meals, I realize I could probably live like this.

item.title: Ultrahuman Home Review: Overpriced and Underbaked
item.description: Ultrahuman, known for its smart ring, is stepping into home environment monitoring, but the experience is far from polished.

item.title: Beware coworkers who produce AI-generated ‘workslop’

item.title: AI startup Friend spent more than $1M on all those subway ads
item.description: If you’ve been on the New York subway recently, you’ve probably seen stark white ads promoting a wearable AI device called Friend.

item.title: How South Korea plans to best OpenAI, Google, others with homegrown AI

item.title: Trump demands Microsoft fire global affairs head Lisa Monaco
item.description: “It is my opinion that Microsoft should immediately terminate the employment of Lisa Monaco,” Trump said of a former Biden administration official.

item.title: The Best Body Pillow, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: From the classic body pillow to unique shapes for optimal limb support, we tested a wide range of body pillows designed for side sleepers.
